a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of children in employment vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Colors represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional to the population of children aged 5-14 in each
**Percent of children (7-14) in employment ** (% of children ages 7-14)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); World Bank (2023); UN, World Population Prospects (2024)
